trans-unit.source: Provides an extension of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" /> to contain namespaces when serializing XPath message queries into XAML.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" /> 的扩展以便在将 XPath 消息查询序列化为 XAML 时包含命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This class is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextTypeConverter> to convert an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension> type.
trans-unit.target: 将此类与 <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextTypeConverter> 一起使用可将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext> 转换为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension> 类型。

trans-unit.source: That class converts the XPath query context information from an XML file into a format that can be serialized as XAML.
trans-unit.target: 此类可将 XPath 查询上下文信息从 XML 文件格式转换为一种可序列化为 XAML 的格式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The XPath message context to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的 XPath 消息上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension" /> class with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: 使用要转换的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.XPathMessageContextMarkupExtension" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageContext" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespaces contained in this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取此实例中包含的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A collection of namespaces and prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间和前缀的集合。

trans-unit.source: A service provider that is not used in the operation.
trans-unit.target: 此操作中未使用的服务提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Provides the namespaces used in the XPath message query.
trans-unit.target: 提供 XPath 消息查询中使用的命名空间。
